name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『Neverland Paradox』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2023 #INAinaNeverland [yT2ety9RfIo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis delivers an MC segment, discussing the 'Neverland Paradox' theme and the transition from a monochrome to a colorful world through her journey with Hololive.
Ina'nis performs 'Dummy Dummy' (ダミーダミー), a song by DECO*27, in a high-energy 3D live performance.

subtitles.original: ...yet mythical, mythical songs.
subtitles.english: ...yet mythical, mythical songs.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: And as you can see, we're kind of in a monochrome world.
subtitles.english: And as you can see, we're kind of in a monochrome world.

subtitles.original: You'd be like, "Hey, did they forget to add in the colors
subtitles.english: You'd be like, "Hey, did they forget to add in the colors

subtitles.original: to this place? What's happening?"
subtitles.english: to this place? What's happening?"

subtitles.original: But you know, I... it's intended.
subtitles.english: But you know, I... it's intended.

subtitles.original: I've always said before that before I joined Hololive and all,
subtitles.english: I've always said before that before I joined Hololive and all,

subtitles.original: the world kind of looked bland and monochrome.
subtitles.english: the world kind of looked bland and monochrome.

subtitles.original: But as time went on here, where I met all wonderful members,
subtitles.english: But as time went on here, where I met all wonderful members,

subtitles.original: wonderful staff, and it became a lot more colorful.
subtitles.english: wonderful staff, and it became a lot more colorful.

subtitles.original: So I wanted to kind of add that into this special live.
subtitles.english: So I wanted to kind of add that into this special live.

subtitles.original: My first birthday live!
subtitles.english: My first birthday live!

subtitles.original: So yeah, maybe you know, if we go down this live,
subtitles.english: So yeah, maybe you know, if we go down this live,

subtitles.original: we'll find some color again?
subtitles.english: we'll find some color again?

subtitles.original: And of course, I've got to mention the title of the live:
subtitles.english: And of course, I've got to mention the title of the live:

subtitles.original: Neverland Paradox.
subtitles.english: Neverland Paradox.

subtitles.original: It sounds very difficult, but if you break it down,
subtitles.english: It sounds very difficult, but if you break it down,

subtitles.original: Neverland is kind of this imaginary, ideal world
subtitles.english: Neverland is kind of this imaginary, ideal world

subtitles.original: that's not supposed to exist.
subtitles.english: that's not supposed to exist.

subtitles.original: But if it doesn't exist, why do we know about it?
subtitles.english: But if it doesn't exist, why do we know about it?

subtitles.original: Why? How? It's a paradox.
subtitles.english: Why? How? It's a paradox.

subtitles.original: So, you know, kind of like that.
subtitles.english: So, you know, kind of like that.

subtitles.original: Let's pretend that this world here, right here, is Neverland,
subtitles.english: Let's pretend that this world here, right here, is Neverland,

subtitles.original: and we'll go down this journey together.
subtitles.english: and we'll go down this journey together.

subtitles.original: Yeah, together!
subtitles.english: Yeah, together!

subtitles.original: Anyways, if you want to talk about this live somewhere,
subtitles.english: Anyways, if you want to talk about this live somewhere,

subtitles.original: let me see the comments later too, #INAinaNeverland.
subtitles.english: let me see the comments later too, #INAinaNeverland.

subtitles.english: #INAinaNeverland. Is it here? Is it here? Is it here? Somewhere?

subtitles.english: Ina's first birthday live! Yay!

subtitles.english: Anyways, I hope you'll have a lot of fun during the live.

subtitles.english: Let's enjoy our trip through Neverland together.

subtitles.english: Never-ever-land.

subtitles.original:
ダミーダミー
Lyrics:Composition: DECO*27
subtitles.english:
Dummy Dummy
Lyrics & Composition: DECO*27

subtitles.original: 一人じゃできないこと　探してみたよ
subtitles.english: I searched for things that couldn't be done alone.

subtitles.original: 二人じゃなきゃできない何かを
subtitles.english: Something that can only be done by two.

subtitles.original: でもその答えを探せば探すほど
subtitles.english: But the more I search for that answer,

subtitles.original: 誰かと笑ってる僕を殺したくなる
subtitles.english:
The more I want to kill the "me"
who's laughing with someone.

subtitles.original: 1 + 1 が一番美しいよ
subtitles.english: 1 + 1 is the most beautiful.

subtitles.original: 僕はそう思いたくて誰かに縛られてる
subtitles.english: I wanted to believe that, and I'm bound by someone.

subtitles.original: 解きたくてそんな自分が一番美しいと思った
subtitles.english:
Wanting to break free,
I thought that version of myself was the most beautiful.

subtitles.original: 二人でできないこと　たくさんある
subtitles.english: There are many things that can't be done by two.

subtitles.original: 一人でできることが　多すぎて
subtitles.english: There are too many things that can be done alone.

subtitles.original: だから僕がもっと大量に必要だよ
subtitles.english: That's why I need much more of "me".

subtitles.original: そして誰かに僕の役を押し付けた
subtitles.english: And then I thrust my role upon someone else.

subtitles.original: 僕の声は　一言も　輪になれない
subtitles.english: My voice can't join the circle by even a word.

subtitles.original: なれないんだから
subtitles.english: Because it just can't.

subtitles.original: ここで誰かが演じる僕を見てるよ
subtitles.english: Here, I'm watching someone perform as me.

subtitles.original: 僕はそう思いたくて誰かが演じる僕が
subtitles.english:
I wanted to believe that,
because the me performed by someone else

subtitles.original: 僕のそれより美しくて輝いているから
subtitles.english: Is more beautiful and radiant than the real me.

subtitles.original: 僕によく似たあなたに僕をプレゼントするよ
subtitles.english: I'll present myself to you, who looks just like me.

subtitles.original: 要らなくなったらそっとゴミに包んで捨てて
subtitles.english:
If you don't need me anymore,
just wrap me in trash and throw me away.

subtitles.original: 要らなくなったらゴミに包んで捨てれるよ
subtitles.english:
If you don't need me anymore,
you can just wrap me in trash and throw me away.
